thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Sean Werlin
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Sean Werlin

author: Sean Werlin
title: Sean Werlin
text: Companies live and die by customer service, especially when it comes to machines that need ongoing support. you can have the best machine and it doesn't mean anything if it breaks and there is no one to help. I have called on support a few different times-each and every time my issue was resolved quickly and professionally. Issues will always arise-either mechanical or training, and BOSS has always come through; even invited me to their shop for a hands on training session (which I did attend).
